import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './WriteNewBlog.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { MdOutlineArrowBackIos } from 'react-icons/md' const WriteNewBlog = (props) => { const heading = useRef(); const author = useRef(); const blogpara = useRef(); const createSubmitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const newBlogPost = { head: heading.current.value, author: author.current.value, blogpara: blogpara.current.value } setNewValue(newBlogPost); props.value(newBlogPost) } return (
